item.description:
**Please note that we are STILL MEETING AT 7pm **

We are now in our 12th week and reading Chapter 12 of the Artist's Way. Please come prepared to discuss the chapter and keep up your morning pages and Artist Dates this week!!

After this week, we will begin to run PARALLEL meeting sessions on both "The Artist's Way" (starting with Ch 1) and "Walking in This World" - both by Julia Cameron. Please come prepared to discuss one or both of these chapters at the NEXT meeting.

If you are able, please bring a donation to the Gallery for the use of their space -- thank you!!
item.how_to_find_us: I will greet you at the door
item.name: Artists Way Cambridge Meetup
